page.title: 03South Charnwood High School
page.content: We interviewed{Mr. Etchingham} Headteacher from{South Charnwood High {School.}The school was officially opened on October 21st 1936,and was called Charnwood Modern School.In 1968 Charnwood became a{High School}in the {Leicestershire comprehensive system of {education.}After South Charnwood the children will go to either Groby or Borworth Colleges. There are four hundred and thirty children at the school,twenty-two teachers and one part timer.Children from{Stanton-under-Bardon,Thornton, {Markfield and Leicester Forest East } attend this High School.The children can go to Charnwood on one of five buses and Mr.Etchingham estimated that three hundred and ninety children travelled that way, others walked, cycled or were taken by car.
